LearningProgramPlanRqmt.name: LearningProgramPlanRqmt
LearningProgramPlanRqmt.description: Represents information about the requirements of a learning outcome thatâ€™s included in the learning program plan.

Category.description: The category associated with the Learning Outcome Item.

Description.description: The description of the Learning Program Plan Requirement.

Duration.description: The allocated length of time for completion of the requirement.

DurationUnit.description: The unit of measurement for length of time for completion of the requirement. Example values include Credit Hours, Clock Hours, No Credit, Continuing Education Units, Other.

GroupName.description: The name of a group of courses.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningAchievementId.description: The Learning Achievement associated with the Learning Program Plan Requirement.

LearningProgramPlanId.description: The Learning Program Plan associated with the Learning Program Plan Requirement.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

MinimumNumericGrade.description: The minimum numeric grade that is required to meet the learning foundation requirement. This is applicable to Learner Program and Course Offering Participant Result.

Name.description: The name of the requirement for a Learning Program Plan.

ReusableLearningProgramPlanId.description: The reusable Learning Program Plan that is associated with the Learning Program Plan Requirement.

SequenceNumber.description: The order that the course or other requirement should be taken within a Learning Program Plan.
